name: George F L Charles Airport
description: The smallest of the two airports.This is located 2km away from the capital, Castries. This is used mainly for coming from or departing to other Caribbean island.

name: Hewanorra International Airport
description: The larger airport of the two on the island. This airport is used for airplanes coming from other countries, this is where you will be flown to.

name: Diamond Botanical Gardens
description: Explore this magical location where a majestic waterfall stands, one of the most popular tourist attractions on the island. This location is both a historic and naturally beautiful site.

name: Mamiku Gardens
description: This 22-acre garden estate includes the ruins of an 18th-century house and three distinct gardens.

name: Marigot Bay
description: Marigot Bay is located on the western coast of the Caribbean island of Saint Lucia, 3.75 miles southwest from Castries and a short distance from the Saint Lucian National Marine Reserve. It is surrounded on three sides by steep, forested hills.

name: Petit Piton
description: The attraction is ideal if you love hiking and nature trails. This is a to do on everyone's bucket list!

name: Pigeon Island
description: Pigeon Island is a 44-acre islet located in Gros Islet in the northern region of Saint Lucia. Once isolated from the country in the Caribbean Sea, the island was artificially joined to the western coast of mainland in 1972 by a man-made causeway built from dirt excavated to form the Rodney Bay Marina.

name: Soufriere Drive In Volcano
description: Bubbling sulfur springs in the caldera of the dormant Qualibou volcano, with nearby mud baths.

name: Treetop Adventure Park
description: Travel along 12 ziplines through the beautiful rainforest with trained guides giving you information about the nature and wildlife in the rainforest.

name: Vigie Beach
description: Vigie Beach is located 2 km north of Castries, Saint Lucia, running parallel

name: Reduit Beach
description: This beach has more than a mile of fine golden sand with lovely views across the bay to Pigeon Island.

name: Anse Cochon
description: This is located down the west coast of the island, between the CAstries and Soufriere. This has 200 metres of dark sand.

name: Anse Chastanet
description: This beach has 150 metres of dark, silver sand.

name: Balenbouche Estate
description: This family owned Historic Plantation Guesthouse has several vacation cottages. Cottages can sleep between 2 to 6 people, some include kitchens. This destination will make you feel at home.

name: Bay Gardens Beach Resort & Spa
description: Stay at this inviting location to experience true adventure and relaxation.

name: Boucan By Hotel Chocolat
description: Located in the hills near Soufriere, this hotel will stun you with the views of the Piton mountains.

name: Calabash Cove Resort & Spa
description: Nested in the sheltered bay of Bonaire Estate, this hotel is one of just a select few full service, bouquet luxury resorts on the island.

name: Coco Palm Resort
description: This award winning bouquet hotel is the perfect destination if you like classic Carribean French Creole decor.

name: Fond Doux Plantation & Resort
description: If you want a romantic, intimate holiday, this location is the one for you. This has 15 private luxury cottages, two on-site restaurants, and a collage of outdoor swimming pools.

name: Ginger Lily Hotel
description: Escape to this family owned boutique hotel, which is moments away from Reduit Beach.

name: Hummingbird Beach Resort
description: This affordable resort is perfect for nature lovers.

name: Jade Mountain Resort
description: This Resort is the only property with the iconic view of both the Piti and Gros Piton mountains.

name: Ladera Resort
description: Experience St Lucia with this resort which is set at the edge of the rainforest, overlooking both the Carribesn sea and the Piton Mountains.

name: La Haut Resort
description: This hotel sits overlooking Soufriere, one of the oldest towns on the island.

name: Mango Beach Inn
description: This location is ideal if you are curious about history, culture and music as well as rainforest, waterfalls, beaches and nature trails.

name: Marigot Bay Resort and Marina
description: At this St Lucian resort, you will experience the culture, cuisine and the traditions.

name: Marigot Beach Club & Dive Resort
description: Travel to this stunning and secluded location.

name: Oasis Marigot
description: Relax at this hotel which offers travellers the ideal holiday for a peaceful break.

name: Royalton Resort & Spa
description: Treat yourself to this luxurious all-inclusive resort destination which over looks the carribean sea. This resort is split into 3 sections: the resort, the Diamond Club and the (adults only) Hideaway.

name: Samfi Gardens
description: This is a newly established family owned property. This has 8 self-contained villas; 7 of them are called Vacation homes and 1 is called Honeymoon Suite.

name: Sandals Grande St Lucian
description: This resort combines historic British and French flavor into one place.

name: Sandals Halcyon Beach
description: Escape to this resort for a relaxing holiday.

name: Starfish St. Lucia
description: This tropical escape is ideal if you love white sand beaches and crystal clear water.

name: Stonefield Villa Resort
description: This secluded location is ideal for all travellers.

name: Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort
description: If you love white sand beaches, this is the hotel for you. Relax at the ultimate vacation experience.

name: St James Club Morgan Bay
description: This relaxing location for everyone. This is an all inclusive which includes meals and beverages.

name: Têt Rouge Resort
description: This villa is the perfect getaway for all. With 6 sea-view studios featuring a specious terrace looking on to the blue Carribean. This is located near the Gros Piton.

name: Ti Kaye Resort & Spa
description: This resort is located on the serene West Coast. This is the best place for a romantic relaxation.

name: The Harbor Club
description: Part of the Hilton collection. Experience the tropical beauty and the maritime charm.

name: Windjammer Landing Villa Beach Resort
description: Have an unforgettable Carribean experience with this resort, with breathtaking views.

name: Big Chef Steakhouse
description: Known for flavour and flair, Big Chef Steakhouse takes the traditional steakhouse to another level of deliciousness, combining the satisfaction of home-cooked comfort food with an innovative, adventurous passion for excellence.

name: Flavours of the Grill
description: This friendly, modest and colourful little restaurant - the wooden house is painted blue, pink and lime green - is one of the best places on St Lucia to sample authentic, inexpensive Caribbean cooking.

name: Jacques Waterfront Dining
description: Jacques Waterfront Dining is one of St. Lucia’s most popular restaurants, with a long-standing reputation for consistency in both the quality of the food and the service with which it is delivered.

name: Maries Local Cuisine
description: A welcoming restaurant next to the botanical gardens with a quality Creole lunch buffet. Good, hearty meals and a fair price.

name: Masala Bay
description: Located in Marigot Bay Marina Village at Capella Resort. Serving authentic Indian and Indo Chinese (Hakka) cuisine.
